short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to add professor ratings directly to UGA course search pages within Athena.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on a rating to visit the professor's page on Rate My Professors or hover over it to show more details about the professor.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The extension can support showing ratings for professors that have a different preferred name than the name displayed in Athena, but these must be manually added (i.e Matthew Seivert goes by Matt Seivert).

If you know of a professor like this that is listed in Rate My Professors under a different name, feel free to send it in as a suggestion under the support tab! 

These suggestions can help to reduce the number of professors that no ratings are displayed for and improve the extension for everyone.

-----------------

Changelog

1.2.1 (2021-05-18)
Now supports 3 professors per section.
Updated list of professors that go by a different name than in Athena. 

1.1.1 (2021-05-17)
Now searches for all reasonable combinations of a professor's name on RMP.  For example, if a professor goes by first name + middle name, it will still be able to find them.

1.0.2 (2021-05-15)
Small style changes.

1.0.1 (2021-05-14)
Hovering over a rating now shows expanded details.

Note:
Though rare, potential "name clashes" could occur if two professors at UGA go by the same name in RMP. It will automatically pick the first result if this occurs, so be sure to check the expanded details by hovering over the ratings.
